meaningMnemonic: If you see a <radical>wolverine</radical> in the <radical>water</radical> playing with a piece of <radical>thread</radical>, there’s no doubt that it’s <kanji>green</kanji>. Wolverines love green thread. Almost as much as they love the water.
readingMnemonic: <reading>Midori</reading> (みどり) is a <kanji>green</kanji> colored melon liqueur with a sweet, fruity taste. This wolverine is too young to drink alcohol like Midori, so he just sticks to drinking water.
